author: A_Brickset_user
title: Very nice pen!
review:
This is not the average pin! Just what pen do you getta Clone Trooper on, eh?  It writes nice and I use it at school a lot.  Nice thing and I engoy doing things with my cloney.  It also comes with some other connections. You can also getta Stormtrooper pen, jango fett pen, anakin pen, darth vader pen, obiwan pen, leia pen, and ofcoarse a skywalker pen!  Nice, works well. 
A pen 10!

author: A_Brickset_user
title: cool pen, the trooper could use some work.
review: this set was ok, the only reson i got this set was for the trooper and cause i wanted another pen. I thought that the clone was a normal mini fig but it isnt he cant sit down the hands come off way to easly and theres the realy anoying thing on top of the helmet that keeps it on the pen i still use the clone but i use him to be the guy that alwas dies first.
